body.name: Ratchet Belt for Men, SIAELT Mens Belt—Genuine Leather Belt with Automatic Slide Buckle
features: What you get—A comfortable genuine leather ratchet belt with 100% satisfaction. Any product or service issue makes you dissatisfied with this belt, please feel free to contact us. We will reply within 24h and make right scheme, full refund or a free replacement, whichever you prefer!

Fashion Design—Simple and elegant, a unique designing idea for each belt buckle, SIAELT belt attach great importance on quality and designing idea but not quantity, and every belt was checked by multiple times. A nice gift for father's day!

Adjustable and comfortable—There are 31 ratchet notches(7inch) on the back of the belt, just slide the belt through the buckle, and the buckle will simply lock ratchet notches. Just press the knob on the buckle, and the belt will be released (If you tie the belt too tight, trying to make it tighter and pressing the knob just at the moment, then the belt will be released). Enjoy the micro-adjustment, whether you are standing, sitting or bending down, you will achieve a comfortable fit.

Trim to Fit—If the belt comes with excess length, you can trim to customize to your ideal fit. just need to remove the belt buckle, and cut the strap at needed size. Belt size need choose longer than your waist size. 8-11'' longer according to your preference. The detail steps are showed on the last product picture
Maximum Durability—High quality alloy buckles, straps with Genuine Leather wears extremely comfortable and will last for years with comfort and enjoyment. So don't delay, just buy it!
body.description: SIAELT belt SIAELT insists on the top grade genuine leather. The design idea of SIAELT belt is for a comfortable daily use but more than that, also in formal occasion. Size Reference Belt length 43"/110cm advised waist size 28"-38"(72-96cm) Belt length 49"/125cm advised waist size 37"-43"(95-110cm) Belt length 51"/130cm advised waist size 39"-46"(100-117cm) How to measure: The belt size is measured from the inner end of the buckle to the last ratchet of the belt. The waist size is measured from the inner end to the first ratchet and the last ratchet of the other end. The belt is sleek and clean, and provides a perfect fit for everyone, if you are not satisfied with the length ,you can also take a simple step to cut the belt, anyway our belt will be the most suitable belt for you . How to cut: 1: Finding a scissor, opening the switch at the back of buckle 2: Taking the strap out from the buckle 3: Cutting the strap to your ideal size 4: Putting back the strap and close the switchEasy to Use No more holes! In the back of belt, there are 38 ratchet notches, it provides a micro size-adjustment of 1/4”, which can follow the variation of your waist precisely. Automatic Just slide in belt and it gets auto-locked. Gently push the lever on the side of the buckle, the lock will be loosen That’s it. It’s slick. It’s smart. Adjustable Our belts can fit for everyone. Trim to fit any size! A tape measure and clear instructions are presenton the product page. Custom your belt in seconds! Elaborate Production Genuine leather composition, fine double edge stitching, and a durable metal buckle ensure the belt's fine quality. Odorless Genuine leather belt only has a slight natural flavor, not any discomfort of inferior leather or PU leather.

reviews.reviewerName: I am all about Redcat exp volcano EXP and exp Pro and some Traxxas read my reviews I did get a couple mixed up though
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product was better than described I am getting ready to buy another one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is difficult to get the belt off as they do not give instructions.I had to go to iTunes to find the way to release the belt. Once that is done it is a great belt at a great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy your size
reviews.reviewText: When they indicate it's a 40" belt, it is not for 40" waist.....it is exactly 40" and does not have enough length to feed into "buckle." Buckle is cheaply made and ratchet steps in back of leather are not hardly deep enough to grab retainer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's basically a ziploc belt
reviews.reviewText: These are the best belts on the market. No holes, you fit it right to your waist. Holds up every time my first 2 sets. I've had for 4 years. I still have and I recently just bought 3 more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Im a big guy and all my other slandered belts always broke at the hole, someone recommended a ratchet belt and I love it. for the price cant beat it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is sketchy
reviews.reviewText: The release button for it jams every time on the one i ordered, and will tighten even more whenever i try to loosen it. Each time i needed another person to help me due to panic from the immense physical pain/pressure the belt was causing me while attempting to remove it, and even THEY couldnt figure out how to release it w/o taking it completely apart since the release button was defective. This is a HUGE design flaw as this belt came in a completely white box with no instructions or even the name of the company so i could look it up on youtube or google without opening amazon and having to lookup the specific order or protocol for something like this. Started out so well but this is very dangerous. I feel for those who experience this when they are running for the restroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars way better then a regular belt
reviews.reviewText: Elevate your style and embrace impeccable craftsmanship with this extraordinary belt! Its sleek design and premium materials make it a true statement piece that effortlessly enhances any outfit. With a perfect blend of durability and sophistication, this belt is the ultimate accessory for the fashion-forward individual.
Great style, but you should learn the unbuckling mechanism before wearing it. It's a "pull outward" lever thing. You should get the hang of it before you really have to use the washroom or something.
